mapper.select: select contract.*, supplier.sup_name, supplier.sup_cip, employee.emp_name, material.material_code, material.material_name from contract join supplier on contract.sup_no = supplier.sup_no join employee on contract.emp_no = employee.emp_no JOIN material_unit_price on contract.mprice_no = material_unit_price.mprice_no JOIN material on material_unit_price.material_no = material.material_no

select contract.*, supplier.sup_name, supplier.sup_reg_no, supplier.sup_cip, employee.emp_name, quotation.quot_file, material.material_name, material.material_code, material.material_raw_material, material.material_description, material.material_unit, material_unit_price.cont_mprice, material_unit_price.mprice_currency from contract join supplier on contract.sup_no = supplier.sup_no join employee on contract.emp_no = employee.emp_no join quotation on contract.quot_no = quotation.quot_no join material_unit_price on contract.mprice_no = material_unit_price.mprice_no join material on material_unit_price.material_no = material.material_no where cont_no=#{contNo}

select * from contract
AND cont_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contract WHERE DATE_FORMAT(cont_date, '%Y%m%d') = #{todayDate}
mapper.insert: insert into contract(cont_code, sup_no, cont_date, cont_period, emp_no, quot_no, cont_material_cnt, cont_material_sku, cont_leadtime, cont_dterms, cont_pterms, cont_file, mprice_no) values(#{contCode}, #{supNo}, #{contDate}, #{contPeriod}, 2, #{quotNo}, #{contMaterialCnt}, #{contMaterialSku}, #{contLeadtime}, #{contDterms}, #{contPterms}, #{contFile}, #{mpriceNo})
insert into material_unit_price(material_no, sell_mprice, cont_mprice, mprice_currency) values(#{materialNo}, #{contMprice}, #{contMprice}, #{mpriceCurrency})
